title: I\'m STILL seeing quite a few signs for political candidates signs around Wilmington.  Isn\'t this some sort of code violation within the city and/or county?  Who do we report these to and what kind of fines will these candidates have to pay for not picking them up in a timely manner?
text:
Here are a couple of links to answer your question.
